options.name: Beginner Striker
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Unarmed Strikes. Gain a Fighting Stance.

options.name: Reaction : Flank
options.description: When an Allied Creature makes a Melee Attack against a target within your Melee Range, you can make an Attack against that same target with a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Novice Striker
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Unarmed Strikes and Learn a Fighting Stance from the Stance Table

options.name: Bending Form
options.description: You can change your Stance at the start of each turn without a cost.

options.name: Journeyman Striker
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Unarmed Strikes and gain access to the Attack of Opportunity Reaction

options.name: Action : Uppercut
options.description: You make a strong Unarmed Strike against a Creature, putting your full force into the blow and adding your Strength Bonus Modifier to the Damage. On a True Hit, the Strength Bonus is doubled.

options.name: Reaction : Counter
options.description: In response to being the Target of a Melee Attack, use your Athletics Skill in place of your Defense Check. If the Attack misses, the Creature must make an Athletics or Acrobatics Check against your Defense Check, or fall Prone.

options.name: Expert Striker
options.description: Gain Critical Hits and +1 Attack with Unarmed Attacks

options.name: Flawless Form
options.description: You gain the Flawless Defense Stance

options.name: Flowing Strikes
options.description: You gain the Flowing Strikes Stance

options.name: Master Striker
options.description: Gain Brutal Critical Hits with Unarmed Strikes and Gain +1 Attack with Unarmed Strikes

options.name: Advantageous Blows
options.description: Unarmed Strikes against Creatures that are Dazed or Stunned are automatically upgraded to Brutal Criticals

options.name: Action : Fatal Force
options.description: Roll a 1d4 and make a number of Unarmed Strikes against a Target equal to the result

options.name: Grandmaster Striker
options.description: Your Damage Die for Unarmed Strikes are upgraded to 2d6.
